job description:
POSITION SUMMARY:

The primary responsibilities of this position are to participate in the development and maintenance support of in-house developed applications. This includes data analysis, manipulation and extraction and creation of simple to moderately complex SQL queries and stored procedures. Will also include analyzing application performance and making recommendation for improvements, testing and evaluating existing application features.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES OR RESPONSIBILITIES:

Developmental and Operational

Develop new and tune existing SQL queries as needed
Maintain and improve existing applications.
Investigate and resolve data issues as needed.
Must be methodical and able to establish priorities
Must be able to recognize confidential data issues and maintain this confidentiality.

Team

Must be able to work in a strong team-oriented environment
Ability to handle high volumes of work without error
Mentor to, learn from, and backup other team members as necessary

JOB SPECIFICATIONS:

A. KNOWLEDGE/EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:

4 year degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or related field (required)
Two (2) or more years experience in relational database design and development using SQL Server is required
Seasoned in the full development life cycle including requirements gathering
Experience developing and supporting mission critical applications that function 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
High motivation and commitment to quality and customer service
Strong debugging, performance tuning and troubleshooting skills

B. SKILLS REQUIRED:

Treats customers with respect-commitment to service
Promotes the mission and vision-performance excellence
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Works collaboratively with others-teamwork
Helps others accomplish objectives-teamwork
Demonstrates a friendly approach
Accurately and effectively communicates
Responds to customer needs-commitment to service

C. ABILITIES REQUIRED:

Responds to work demands
Maintains confidentiality
Assumes accountability
Demonstrates acceptance of diverse populations

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Please refer to the job description for details.
